sn_tools.sn_utils module¶

class sn_tools.sn_utils.Generate_Sample(sn_parameters, cosmo_parameters, mjdCol='mjd', seasonCol='season', filterCol='filter', min_rf_phase=-15.0, max_rf_phase=30.0, area=9.6)¶

Bases: object

Generates a sample of parameters for simulation Input ——— sn_parameters: X1, Color, z, DayMax, … (see yaml file input) cosmology parameters: H0, Om0 Returns (call) ——— recordarray of parameters to simulate: X1,Color,z,DayMax

Get_Dist(rate)¶

get (X1,C) distributions Input ——— rate: name of the X1_C distrib (JLA, …)

Returns:

dict of (X1,C) rates

keys: ‘low_z’ and ‘high_z’

val: recarray with X1,Color,weight_X1,weight_Color,weight
Get_Val(type, val, distrib, weight)¶

Get values of a given parameter Input ——— type: random or not val : return value (if not random) distrib, weight: distrib and weight to get the parameter

Returns:parameter value
